original_title: Te guardo no bolso da memória
overview: “Te guardo no bolso da saudade” is an essay film that rescues through memories, narration and archival images the story of Neide, a black woman who died during the 2003 Carnival in Natal, Rio Grande do Norte. The work consists of the realization of this short film, from pre-production to post-production, phases that will be detailed through this process report.
tagline: A daughter weaves memories of her mother.
title: I keep you in my memory pocket
